about_the_game:
🏦 Bank Simulator Start with a small bank 🏦 featuring Tellers, Marketing, and Investments, and expand with ATMs and more. Build your team 👥, upgrade facilities for happier customers 😊, invest smartly 📈, balance risks ⚖️, and grow wealth 💰. Reinvest profits to upgrade, expand, and create your financial empire 💼✨!

💰Handle essential banking services and ensure customer satisfaction as your branch grows.



🎨Customize your bank's layout with stylish furniture and eye-catching decor to impress customers.


⚙️Oversee crucial operations, including ATM maintenance, marketing strategies, and investment activities.

Bank Simulator Key Features:

  • 🏦 Customer Service & Tellers: Create accounts, handle withdrawals, and process deposits.

  • 🛠️ Manager Office: Oversee operations and strategies.

  • 📈 Investment: Invest wisely to grow the bank's assets.

  • 📰 News with Investing: Stay updated for smart financial decisions.

  • 📢 Marketing: Promote your bank and attract new customers.

  • 💼 Hand Bag: Manage and transport cash efficiently.

  • 👥 Interviews: Hire and expand your team.

  • 🔐 Vault: Manage the vault money securely.

  • 📊 Reporting: Analyze and optimize performance.

In Bank Simulator, every choice impacts your bank’s growth, profitability, and customer satisfaction. Will you steer your bank to financial success, earning the loyalty of clients and creating a legacy in the world of finance? 💼💸

name: Bank Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Build your team 👥upgrade facilities for happier customers 😊invest smartly 📈balance risks ⚖️and grow wealth 💰Reinvest profits to upgrade, expand, and create your financial empire💼
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
